overview: It's that time of year again; thin summer dresses, afternoons lounging by the pool and sexy, sweaty bodies tanning beneath the sweltering, summer sun. But nothing compares to the heat coming off of these gorgeous models captured exploring their burning desire for the female form. So turn on the fan and prepare yourself for a warming trend of Summer Sapphic Seductions delivered by Sex Art, the industry leader of all girl footage.
title: Summer Sapphic Seductions 2
